website_summaries.verdict: A cute, well-made collection of toys that resemble a pizza. Cats love the catnip, and their owners love the fun theme.
pros: Adorable design features a soft "pizza" with "topping" toys that contain catnip
All pieces are durable enough to hold up to vigorous play
Customers have reported that their cats even like playing in the "pizza" box the toys arrive in
Presentation makes this toy set an excellent gift for cat lovers
cons: Some cats aren't interested in it, which is a common complaint of cat toys

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Funny, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, one for my cats, and one for my dad's cat. It was a hit at my family's Christmas party, and my cats really love it. One of my cats, Harlequin, gets aggressive when on the 'nip, haha! I let them play with it for the day, then had to hide it, because they kept going back to it, going nuts, tossing the toys all over, and sweet Bubbeigh kept getting attacked by queen Harlequin, so a time-out was definitely needed lol. There was a slight imperfection with one of the "toppings" (yellow bell pepper), looked like smeared ink, or something, but aside from that, it's a really great quality product that I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeetleJes

customer_reviews.title: For whatever reason my cats love these toys
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason my cats love these toys! Bonus is the toys are super cute too. Great find on Amazon and extremely reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. My cat absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My cat absolutely loves it. He likes to beat up the pepperoni. Good quality and quick delivery. 0 complaints. The pizza has a grippy bottem so it doesn't slide across the floor and the toys are well crafted. Very strong material. Is standing up to a 20lbs cats beating.
customer_reviews.author: Kaella badtke

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because, let’s face it, this is adorable and who doesn’t love to buy cute stuff for their cats? It arrived a few weeks ago and all three of my cats loved it immediately. My kitten likes destroying the box (really he likes destroying any box). My two older cats like the crinkle factor with the pizza and the plush toys are fun to kick and throw around. Great purchase really well made and are holding up to some rough playing.
customer_reviews.author: Audrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, my cat just isn’t interested in it. As I read the reviews I wondered why so many kitties were enthralled by this... I mean, cats don’t even know what pizza is! 🙃 With my kitty, it was a kind of a dud. She loves to fetch almost all of her many toys but she rarely even chases any of the “pizza toppings”. She looks, sees what it is, and looks away. She’s chewed the box up a bit (which isn’t much different than an actual small pizza box, which I often have around anyway lol). That must have happened when I was out because I’ve never seen her do it.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was such a hit with my three cats that I bought another for my dad’s cat. She also loves it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Instant happiness, right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my new kittens! Even the older cats love these toys. I couldn't tell you what attracts their attention the most, but the kittens move from one topping to another and don't stop playing for a good long time. One kitten in particular loves to take naps on the pizza itself. The other likes to chew on the box, which I have now fortified with packing tape to help preserve it. I have FINALLY found cat toys that don't hurt when I step on them! Tile floors keep these toppings scooting along, too. Great fun! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kasee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is their new favorite toy! I hear crinkling at all times of ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats opened the pizza box before I even had a chance to. This is their new favorite toy! I hear crinkling at all times of day and night. The topping pizzas are traveling around the house constantly as they play. Good quality toy, fun for the cats, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayn

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for Cats and their People
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two 8 week old kittens, 1. because it had good reviews and 2. because it is hilarious. As for playing with it, it took some warming up. They are big fans of chewing and jumping on the pizza box. They chase the stuffed ingredients around and the sound the image side makes when rubbed or scratched gets their attention. They are not too sure about the actual pizza. The underside makes a loud crinkle sound which frightens the more skittish kitten away. The kittens do not seem very interested in laying or playing on the pizza and tend to walk over it as if they don't notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: 4 cats LOVED the pizza & toys !
customer_reviews.text: I purcased this for 5 cats who can be seen on the YouTube channel The Lucky Fears. They loved the toys & Splash the Cat kept trying to eat the olives on the pizza, Boo the cat was trying to tear his toy open & a determined cat may well tear open the toy. But its still a great gift & great fun for cats who love catnip. I am going to buy one for my 3 cats as soon as my new credit card arrives. They love catnip too.
customer_reviews.author: george senda

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS TOY! A MUST HAVE FOR YOUR CATS! MADE SO WELL!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! So ingenious! My cats love it! They best part is that it's like having a few toys for the price of one! They love to lay on the "pizza" & they love to throw & bat around the "food pieces". But you know I think the box is also a favorite of theirs! They actually fight over it!! I don't want to get the same thing. Do you have other toys like this? Please let me know! Thanks, Donna G. kazoo1228@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gamper

customer_reviews.title: Cat absolutely loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loved this toy! The crinkle of the pizza itself encourages play. Each piece of the toy is made very well. Even the box is a fun toy for your cat to play with or chew on. Bought a second one for another family members cat too!
customer_reviews.author: kindlefire2

customer_reviews.title: Cats will love playing with this toy,
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the pizza and vegetables. She tosses the vegetables around and loves playing with them. She rubs her face on them and likes biting them. We put the pizza and vegetables in a box she loves and she has been sleeping with her vegetables and pizza. I saw this pizza was sent to Blind Cat Rescue as a gift to the cats and they love it. I had to go and order it for my cat who loves this toy. I would highly recommend this for your cat. Great seller and fast shipping. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Girl

customer_reviews.title: My two cats and our fav Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pizza as a Xmas gift for my two cats. I wrapped it in wrapping paper and put it under the Xmas tree about a week before Xmas. Even when it was wrapped under the tree, my cats smelled the catnip and knew it was for them, so they kept investigating it, smelling it and they even tried to open it. It was super cute. Once we finally opened it for them, they both went crazy for the pizza. It was an hour of complete craziness. They loved it. They still love it and they still play with it and sit in it. But the first reaction was priceless. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia in Brooklyn, NY

customer_reviews.title: A success!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVED this product! The presentation is adorable in a little “pizza box”. The pizza itself is a durable fabric with a little bit of stuffing in it and rubber on the bottom to keep from sliding. Inside the box there are four-five individual pieces of “pepperoni”, “onion”, “pepper” etc. Each piece has the same durable fabric on one side, and a soft fleece backing. The cherry on top was the pizza box. My cats laid right in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: CATS LOVE THEIR PIZZA BOX!
customer_reviews.text: Currently have 2 foster kittens & surrogate MomKat, fluctuates monthly. This cat pizza w/box was a hit as soon as I put it in the room with them! MomKat/Noelle like it so much, she ate the box! She loves to sit inside on the pizza & chill. The pillow parts are all over the room, as the kittens like to carry them around & beat them up. They also want to get into the box when Noelle is not in it. This is a great cat toy & I will have to get more for my other cats since it seems to calm them down. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DiBird5

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. My two cats just love this "pizza." The box is long gone because is really is just like a pizza box and the cats kept making the hole bigger to get to the toppings by chewing, etc.. We wake up every day and pick up the toppings from around the house just so the cats can grab them again and carry them to wherever they are going to play with them. So cute! BEST 10 DOLLARS EVER!
customer_reviews.author: S. Parry

customer_reviews.title: High quality and entertainment for hours
customer_reviews.text: After watching the videos of cats rubbing their faces all over the toppings I was sold, and it was still better than expected. My cat tears up toys like a dog and these have held up well. My cat doesn't really like crinkle toys so she ignores the main pizza, but this is such a bargain for such a high quality toy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Made my lazy cats playful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute fun cat toy that my cats instantly went crazy for. Cats love toys and boxes, this item gives them both!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: After reading about the Interactive pizza I thought my kitten would love it. She loved it for the first few days and that was it. She kept wanting to put the individual parts into her water bowl for some reason, and forget about the box itself, that was a DUD. Overall, I wouldn't buy it again because it didn't provide the entertainment that I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bierd

customer_reviews.title: A Killer Gift
customer_reviews.text: If you know someone who is a cat fiend, this is one killer gift. Yes, their cat will love it, and the owner will love it, and will love all the photo opportunities it affords them. Be warned, you will receive an untold number of photos of that special cat, wrestling with the box and all the pizza bits and pieces. This is a great gift and it will make you look both generous and brilliant, which you probably are.
customer_reviews.author: gone2ground

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying cat toys for years and this is seriously is the best purchase ever! All of them love the toys the pizza and even the box. They have been playing with them consistently for days....which never happens. I'm buying more for when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying this because my cat really doesn't play with alot of toys, but I thought it was cute and he'd probably at least lay in the box. Gave it to him on Christmas and he instantly played with it and layed on the pizza and in the box. He has continuously been going back to it. Terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb F.

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest cat toy ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest cat toy ever. Both my cats played with and chewed the box and the ‘toppings’ are shiny on one side and slide across the floor and fluffy on other side the other and light and easy for the cats to carry. The cats literally walked by and grabbed toppings and go off to play. Later they crash in the pizza. Hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Jenalyn99

customer_reviews.title: Cute Consept
customer_reviews.text: This would be a fine toy for other cats. My cat is very finicky regarding toys. Has many toys she no longer plays with because of the cat wand I kept hidden, and she rediscovered! Carries it all over our home, all day long. Must shut away nights. Occasionally, she will toss around the Easyology cat toys. Highly recommend, though, for other cats!
customer_reviews.author: Anne T. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat went crazy for this when I took it out of the box. Still plays with it every day! Sent one to my Mom and her cat loves it too! Great cat toy!! Everyone loves it!! A few of my friends ended up buying it after o posted a video of our cat playing with it in Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Itsleah

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Love Pizza
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's cat. When I took it out of the shipping box and set it down my 3 cats were all over the pizza box. They were biting the box trying to get the toys out and rolling all over it. I guess they like pizza. I just ordered another one for my cats. It's a great size( not too small) and well worth the money. I have already recommended this toy to family and friends. It's very unique and my cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: sued

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat really enjoyed this toy. She loves sitting on pizza boxes, so this was a nice way to provide her with a clean box to sleep on. The pizza itself has a nice crinkle to it that she really enjoys. She's pretty big (14 pounds and very fluffy), so her butt pretty much covers the whole pizza when she sits on it (pictured). She also really likes playing with the toppings; she can be picky with toys like that but really likes pouncing on these and chasing them around the apartment. She gives this toy four paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves her new toy. She will both beat up the toppings and sleep in the box. The toys are well made and stand up to rough play very well, they still look new. Some of her creative sleeping positions leave the box showing some wear, but it's cardboard and I expect that. Buy this for the cat in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 111

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: My cats immediately started playing with the pizza and toppings. They loved rolling on it and attacking the toppings. The toppings were moved all around the house within a few hours. Even after a few weeks the cats are still enjoying the pizza, though they prefer to sit on it more than roll on it now. The toppings are still a favorite toy among the cats and move daily.
customer_reviews.author: thepingun

customer_reviews.title: I have three cats and I think they all like the pizza box the best (of course)
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and unique. I have three cats and I think they all like the pizza box the best (of course). It was a great deal for the price and I would definitely recommend it. It's really great if you have multiple cats since you get several toys in one.
customer_reviews.author: AlleyCat

customer_reviews.title: Cats don’t care
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. My cats love pizza boxes & toys so I figured they’d love this...nope. Couldn’t care less. Whatever kind of catnip is used is way too weak. My cats will play with just about anything but they have zero interest in this. It looks cool but also pretty out of place. Large toy for not being used. I’ll probably donate it to the shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C

customer_reviews.title: Yeowww purrfectly executed this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is amazing! I ordered the pizza cat toy, it arrived in a pizza box, complete with pizza advertising! the pizza and each topping are there own individual toys. I am pretty sure I enjoyed this toy more than my cats. BUT they absolutely loved it too! They love all the Yeowww products. Thank you Yeowww, you executed this product so well. I am excited to see what else you come out with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Rafter

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy 🐱
customer_reviews.text: My bengal loved it. He loves boxes (it’s a cat thing) and cat nip so this was an easy decision. He rolled around in the box and bit, slobbered on and chewed all the toppings. He made it looked so fun I almost wanted to try myself. Later he brought toppings to me to throw so he can fetch. The pieces are well made and the cat nip seemed to be good quality. He also tore up the pizza which makes for great crinkly fun. We had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Batman our cat LOVES this!!
customer_reviews.text: Batman RAN over when I opened this and rolled around, taking out the pieces of pizza and running to the living room and back with various pieces in his mouth! He was happy to lay and chew on the pizza and went crazy over the box! I was hesitant to purchase this, but after reading reviews decided to buy. Best purchase ever. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Streaker

customer_reviews.title: Catizza
customer_reviews.text: This is almost too adorable for words. They love their pizza and play with it and the parts quite often which is great for two boys pushing 12years old. It is so well made that it looks new after being played with on a daily basis. The box it arrived in is very creative
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats were not amused.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. Although nicely presented in it’s pizza box, and very attractive to look at, my two cats had no interest in it whatsoever. And if the cats don’t play with it, to me it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: It was a very Merry Christmas here! Petunia loves this toy and she’s a very finicky cat!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Anne

customer_reviews.title: The cats like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and cat's mom reports it's a hit with 4 8-month old kittens and even their older cat. It was still a favorite when I visited a week later. They all like sitting on the pie, which makes a crinkly sound, and batting the toppings to all corners of the house several times a day. I think their cat mom tossed the box- would not have survived long with them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase this month!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this product I knew that Francine & Willow desperately needed this! Just like the videos that were uploaded on here already, both cats immediately got in the box and wouldn't leave the pizza "bed" alone for hours. The catnip seems to be potent enough for their liking, and the packaging couldn't be any cuter!
customer_reviews.author: Rah

customer_reviews.title: Great toy at a good price
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves all parts of this- the box, the pizza, and the toppings (especially the toppings and box). Great toy at a good price. My daughter loves "making the pizza" for kitty too, so she actually uses it herself to play with him :)
customer_reviews.author: Swamp

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was on this the moment I opened the box! She loves it. This is the best purchase I've ever made for her. She rubbed her face in it, she licked it, and even attempted to bite it. Then she laid down on it, tucked her face to the pizza, and went to sleep. Later I looked and she had her head in the box again. Very happy kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. my cars
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars really based on its so cute! However my 4 cats played with this for a few minutes and that was it. Only one of the 4 “toppings” you could actually smell the catnip, the pizza itself they had no interest in whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit! We have 5 furry kids and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit! We have 5 furry kids and they have been taking turns playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina W.

customer_reviews.title: "we love cat pizza, so neat" -the cats
customer_reviews.text: My mom got us this, as soon as the box was opened all hell broke loose and both cats started going crazy for it! LOL love it!!! Looks cute and durable compared to most catnip filled toys 👍
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Good but......
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. One of them has become especially attached to the pizza pillow. Unfortunately, the pillow was not sewn well at the seam and is already coming apart after about a week. My cats have not been rough with it. Hopefully I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: All cats love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone else's cat get this as a Christmas gift and they loved it. I decided to get one for our 2 cats and they jumped right on it. They small toys were thrown all over and then they would fight over who got to sit in the box on the pizza. They toy is well made and really cute. I ordered a second and now there are plenty of toys and pizza boxes for all. I will definitely check this brand out to see what else they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S Gauger

customer_reviews.title: Addictive for cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this toy, he went crazy over the pizza as soon as I set it down. The pizza box was a hit too, my cat laid in it comfortably and wouldn't move, highly recommend this toy to any cat lovers!
customer_reviews.author: JOLIE

customer_reviews.title: Even grumpy old cats can’t resist this pizza!
customer_reviews.text: All my cats and foster kittens are fighting over this toy. I think that’s a first for us! Here is a picture of my foster cat, Garfield. Garfield isn’t into toys. But as you can see he certainly enjoys pizza! Just ordered more of them to go around! I am not being paid to say this and rarely make the time to write reviews, so it must be good! 😻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy the cats like
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! They like what is in the box too. LOL Cat owners understand.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy....
customer_reviews.text: My Ragdolls like the toy, or should I say, the box. The pizza is colorful, crinkles and has super cute 'toppings', cats can toss around. My boys favorite is the box, though, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Conny

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Love this
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the cat gifts we gave our 3 cats. They were crazy about it! Absolutely loved this toy. I had to take the pizza part away for awhile because my Main Coon cat was ripping it up he loved it so much. Great buy! If the pizza gets destroyed, I may purchase another one. Good investment. Pizza parts all over the house, constantly played with and they are having fun. Great service. Great gift. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my cat for Christmas. It's April and it's still like his favorite thing in the world. His favorite is the tomato. That poor thing is wrecked it's gotten so much love. Will 💯 buy again when he totally destroys everything.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Kelly Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 Spent on Cats
customer_reviews.text: Best $10 ever spent on our cats. They were rolling around in the box on the pizza - biting at the stuffed toppings. One of our boys was crying he couldn't wait for me to open the pizza box so he could get inside. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Oelmann

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAT TOY EVER
customer_reviews.text: Y’ALL MY CAT LOVES THIS CAT PIZZA!!! HE CONSTANTLY TAKES THE TOPPINGS OUT OF THE BOX. HE DROOLS ALL OVER THE PIZZA AND THE BOX! THIS IS THE BEST CAT TOY I HAVE EVER PURCHASED!!! I CANNOT RECOMMEND IT ENOUGH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Cats Not Really Intersted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 cats for a Xmas gift. I gave it to them yesterday, and so far, they really don't show any interest in it. One of my cats is more interested in the box that it came in, then the toys inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: PiedPiper

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Cats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy as a Christmas gift for my father-in-law’s cats. They went ballistic over it on Christmas, and still do several months later. In addition to playing with the “toppings,” they will curl up and sleep on the “crust” as well. The pieces have held up well, and I highly recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Rra104

customer_reviews.title: Even the box becomes a toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! They take turns sitting on the pizza and love playing with the toppings. Save the box! My kitties like the box, too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Picky Cats Loved!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gifts I ever got for my cats! They have every kind of toy ever made and they absolutely loved this. It is almost impossible to find anything that they all like but they loved the cat pizza! As soon as I gave it to them they were tearing into the box trying to get it out. They all ran off with their favorite topping. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Just not interested
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats wouldn't even go near the toys, smelled them and walked away, there very cute but, my 1 year & 2 year old refused to play with them. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: kjm

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it too
customer_reviews.text: My maltese loves these catnip toys...it took him two days before she was able to rip one of them open and get the filling all over my bed. As for my cats, they loved the large pizza pad and one is now sleeping on it
customer_reviews.author: eileena

customer_reviews.title: purring like a nutcase
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not the biggest fan of catnip but oh boy oh boy...she LOVES this toy so much. She'll lay on top of the pizza and chew and kick at the toppings, purring like a nutcase. She loves the box as well, chewing on the corners of the top. She puts other toys into the box, along with the pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Auer

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 kitties who are very picky about what toys Mom brings home. This has been one of their faves of all time! The pizza box drew them in and there were so many toppings that each kitty got a toy to play with. Well, after Jacob relinquished them for communal use, that is. My old kitty loves laying on the pizza and the toppings are being batted all over the house. Ten bucks! Wow! You will not go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: elaine lane

customer_reviews.title: Unique cat toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our family cat and he loved it! He is a cat that has every toy, so he was thrilled to have something really unique to play with. There is a big stuffed pizza toy on the bottom and stuffed toy toppings on the top, plus its all packed in a fun box...so its a bunch of toys all in one! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: TeresaL

customer_reviews.title: Winner, winner pizza dinner
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this toy! I have four cats and they all think it's the best thing in the house. I bought it for Xmas thinking it would just be more of a gag throwaway gift but boy was I wrong! It's a race who can get to it first and then they don't want to move until the absolutely have to. It's so entertaining to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S

customer_reviews.title: I have four cats and this is the best. They ate the box
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I have four cats and this is the best. They ate the box. Well, no not literally but what a great gift for them. :)
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My little tortie Sammy took to this immediately. She especially likes to use it as a bed. I had to put it in the wash recently because another one of my cats peed on it. It held up well in the wash, and as soon as I brought it back upstairs, Sammy came running for it! My other cats like to play with the topping toys, and the box was a hit as well 😊 I bought this on a whim because I thought it was cute, but it was definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation but not a hit with my kitties
customer_reviews.text: Wish my ginger boys liked it as much as I did =( Very nice packaging and toys were very well made, but had to give it 3 stars because of the lack of interest from my kitties...sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 ever spent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $10 I ever spent for my cats. They love this stupid toy. I have 2 cats and they fight over it. They mostly love sitting in it. They’re not super crazy about the “toppings,” but they sleep in this thing, fight over it, watch the dog in it etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sisto

customer_reviews.title: My cats are in love!
customer_reviews.text: My order came today and my cats are in love!! I let my Tabby do the honors of breaking the you in and he was smitten. He was all over the box before the toys had even come out. I'll definitely be purchasing more of this company's products since they make my furbabies so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Avianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cat toy I have ever purchased! My cat loves to sleep on it and flips the toys (toppings) everywhere. The quality is excellent and very well made. I'm purchasing this again for my sister's cat.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Emerich

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this thing. I don’t know why but she just does. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Bevii3000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun toy!! Love the pizza idea - really cute. The cat pizza is very well made, and I still can’t get over the great prize! My boys were so excited about it, I immediately ordered two more as gifts for friends. Posted pics on Facebook and had many questions about where to buy. I will be buying more at the holidays to gift to my cat loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: No other toy has kept my cat's interest as this one has. Both cats play with this for extended periods of time and yes, they love the box too. After playing, I put everything back in the box and the cats will find their way back and put their paws into the openings trying to get the toys. I highly recommend this pizza for all cats.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love their new catnip pizza toy
customer_reviews.text: Our cats went crazy when we opened the box! They absolutely love their new catnip pizza toy! This was a great purchase and the price is amazing!!! I highly recommend this for your fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best ever toy. My 11 year old cat totally pounced on the pizza box, then threw the little toppings around, then played on the pizza, and finally cuddled up in the box. Great idea, well made, greT price, and simply well eorth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Fromer

customer_reviews.title: My two cats LOVE this! I find the little toys everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My two cats LOVE this! I find the little toys everywhere. They are great quality for the price. My cats are picky and they love this!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this toy so much that I bought it for a friend’s cats for Christmas! Really cute and definitely a conversation piece too!
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved their 'catnip' pizza
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and they loved this pizza. At first, one of them wouldn't even let the other one play with it, but then they both got in on the fun. Well worth the $10 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: helen a flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Customers will love it. They won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this item and fell in love with it. I've never seen anything like it. I couldn't believe the price. My cats love it. Every day I find the pizza toppings all throughout the house. My one cat loves sleeping on the pizza. I even brought it to work to show my cat lover co-workers. They all loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a friend that had elderly cats. They loved it ! Both cats turned into kittens when playing and fought over who gets to sit in the pizza box. Great quality toy. The toppings are adorable ! I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Was not exciting
customer_reviews.text: Kitty is a vibrant one, but she found this to be a bit boring. Need to get her something more exciting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Uh ....
customer_reviews.text: We thought it was pretty cute, but our cat looked at it and walked away ... without touching it! And has yet to touch it ... unless, of course, she did it in the night when we were not watching!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My cat that loves boxes loved this toy! He was obsessed with it when I was trying to wrap it, went right to it when he opened his present and sniffed the heck out of it when we opened the lid. Then he passed out for a good amount of time. He says 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ohhaythere

customer_reviews.title: The. Best.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought three of these for cat Christmas gifts, all the furry friends love them! So cute and keeps them entertained for hours! Such a good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my cat - so I don't know yet how he will like it, but he was VERY interested in smelling the box, a good sign of quality cat nip! The pizza is adorable and I LOVE the pizza box. I think it will be a huge hit Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bayleaf

customer_reviews.title: Cats will love the Easyology Pizza
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my kitty went bonkers over the Easyology Pizza. She threw the pieces of pizza around after hugging them and then she laid on the pizza and rolled on the pizza. She was in heaven. She loves it. A definite hit. And then she did the same with the pizza box! A very happy kitty. I am so glad I got the Easyology Pizza for her. Colleen Allard
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Allard

customer_reviews.title: Buy This
customer_reviews.text: My grandcats absolutely love, love, love the pizza toy. It's been months and they still play with it, sleep on it, fight over who gets the pepperoni. We've gotten lots of laughs b/c of this cat toy.
customer_reviews.author: BFG

customer_reviews.title: They got tired of it quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was interesting for about a day, then they ignored it. I'll put it back out sometime if I'm going to be away all day.
customer_reviews.author: kk_in_sf

customer_reviews.title: The cats LOVE this toy!!
customer_reviews.text: The cats LOVE this toy!! They even play with the pox it comes in. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: My grand kitties went nuts over them. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My grand kitties loved these. I bought them 3 years ago and they wore them out. Thank you for having them in stock this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Levasseur

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for all cats!
customer_reviews.text: I have gifted this pizza box to many cat friends and they all LOVE it! Cats love boxes and what’s better than a box with a catnip pizza in it?!! Nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Bjork

customer_reviews.title: Even kitties love pizza!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. As soon as I showed it to them they started playing. They love it. The pizza pie seems very sturdy. I will be buying a few more for gifts for the crazy cat ladies in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi J

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my parents cats and let me tell you, they LOVE everything about it. They wouldn't stop playing with it and the box they enjoyed just as much. I've been telling all my friends about it since.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My cat went crazy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this, but the pizza only lasted a few hours before it was in shreds...lol. The toppings are still intact so far and he loves those too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this toy right away! It's so adorable. They absolutely love kicking the topping pieces, sitting on the pizza pie and the cardboard pizza box. I would recommend this product to anyone with cats, they don't even have to be super playful. It's awesome quality for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: If All Else Fails, There's the Box
customer_reviews.text: My (toy snob) cat showed some interest in the pizza toppings. But it ultimately came down to the box. Sitting, loafing and pawing at the cut-out paw print in the box, has the most appeal for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVED this Pizza !!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought Easyology Cat Toys Interactive Pizza as a gift for my daughter's cat. I had left the unopened Pizza box on the table. This morning when I came down I found my kittens had torn it open and removed some of the pizza's pieces. The smell through the box was strong enough that they had to have it for themselves. They loved this Pizza. They haven't stopped playing with it. I had to buy another one for my daughter's cat. I think it was money well spent. I like the product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly rubio

customer_reviews.title: Cats and dog loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!!! Adorable packaging. Cats loved the crinkle sounds and nip!! Dog also like the pizza toppings.
customer_reviews.author: Natali Young

customer_reviews.title: My cats love the box
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. Both LOVE to lay on the pizza box, sometimes at the same time. One in particular kicks around the "toppings" quite often, while the other prefers the cardboard. I am very happy that they both use it for different things.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

product_meta.title: Easyology Cat Toys Interactive Pizza: The ONLY Cat Toy Served in a Pizza Box – Best Cat Toys Fun Cat Teaser - Best Kitten Toys Gifts - Catnip Toys Cat Charmer Cat Toys Cats
feature_bullets: EVEN CATS LOVE PIZZA...The cat toy consists of a big, round pizza cushion toy and 5 other stuffed toys that represent the ingredients of the pizza -Tom the tomato, Chester cheese, Pepperoni Pete, Molly the mushroom and Ollie the onion.

THE PIZZA COMES IN A PIZZA BOX...Your cat will not only play with the kitten toys, but it will also love the pizza box! You know how cats get when they see a box - it will climb in it, lie there and be cozy and happy. Every single piece of this cat toy set is fun and enjoyable!

THE STUFFED PIZZA MAKES A GREAT CAT BED...The round pizza toy is like a cushion, so your cat can lie on it and take a nap, or simply relax. You can even take the cat pizza toys with you when you leave the house, so that your cat has something to keep her entertained and comfortable.

MADE WITH THE SOFTEST MATERIALS...Made with the softest fabric and materials, the pizza catnip is incredibly fluffy and pleasant to touch. The materials will remain soft, no matter how often your cats play with the pizza toy and how often you wash it.

FINALLY A CAT TOY THAT IS DURABLE...We know how easy it is for cats to destroy their toys with their sharp claws, for this reason we made sure that the materials we used are very durable. So get the Easyology cat toy set and stimulate your cat! We're 100% sure that you won't regret this purchase or your money back!
